abilityshield: Holder's Ability cannot be changed or nullified. Prevents Neutralizing Gas or Gastro Acid from removing key abilities like Good as Gold.
absorbbulb: Consumable. Raises Sp. Atk by 1 stage if hit by a Water-type move. Niche use on special attackers.
adamantcrystal: Holder must be Dialga-Origin. Boosts Dragon/Steel moves by 20% and changes form. Required for Dialga-Origin.
adrenalineorb: Consumable. Raises Speed by 1 stage if Intimidated. Used on competitive physical attackers (Bisharp, Milotic) to punish Incineroar.
aguavberry: Consumable. Restores 33% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less (confuses if -SpD nature). Standard burst healing.
airballoon: Holder is immune to Ground-type attacks until popped by a direct hit. Great for Steel/Fire types to avoid Earthquake.
apicotberry: Consumable. Raises Sp. Def by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Niche; sometimes on Endure strategies.
assaultvest: Holder's Sp. Def is 1.5x, but it cannot use status moves. Premier item for bulky attackers (Rillaboom, Iron Hands).
babiriberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Steel-type attack. Essential for Fairy-types (Sylveon, Flutter Mane).
bigroot: Holder gains 1.3x HP from draining moves. Niche; used on Drain Punch/Horn Leech users for sustain.
bindingband: Holder's binding moves (Magma Storm, Sand Tomb) deal 1/6 max HP/turn. Niche trap strategy item.
blackbelt: Holder's Fighting-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Close Combat/Drain Punch.
blackglasses: Holder's Dark-type attacks have 1.2x power. Standard on Kingambit/Chien-Pao/Urshifu-S.
blacksludge: Restores 1/16 max HP each turn if Poison-type; damages others. Leftovers equivalent for Amoonguss/Glimmora.
blunderpolicy: Consumable. Sharply raises Speed if the holder misses a move. Niche; used with Hypnosis.
boosterenergy: Consumable. Activates Protosynthesis/Quark Drive. The defining Gen 9 item for Paradox Pok√©mon.
brightpowder: The accuracy of attacks against the holder is 0.9x. RNG evasion item; generally outclassed by consistent bulk.
cellbattery: Consumable. Raises Attack by 1 stage if hit by an Electric-type move. Very niche.
charcoal: Holder's Fire-type attacks have 1.2x power. Common on Torkoal/Chi-Yu/Incineroar.
chartiberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Rock-type attack. Vital for Fire/Flying types.
chestoberry: Consumable. Cures sleep. Used for Rest+Chesto strategies or anti-Spore.
chilanberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a Normal-type attack. Very niche.
choiceband: Holder's Attack is 1.5x, but it locks into one move. Wallbreaker item.
choicescarf: Holder's Speed is 1.5x, but it locks into one move. Essential speed control.
choicespecs: Holder's Sp. Atk is 1.5x, but it locks into one move. Immediate power item.
chopleberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Fighting-type attack. Essential for Tyranitar/Kingambit.
clearamulet: Holder's stats cannot be lowered by others. Premier Gen 9 item; blocks Intimidate and Icy Wind.
cobaberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Flying-type attack. Useful for Amoonguss/Urshifu.
colburberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Dark-type attack. Vital for Ghost/Psychic types.
cornerstonemask: Holder must be Ogerpon. Becomes Rock-type; attacks have 1.2x power. Prevents item removal.
covertcloak: Holder ignores secondary effects of moves (Flinch, Salt Cure, Stat drops). Essential for supports.
custapberry: Consumable. Holder moves first in priority bracket when at 1/4 max HP or less. Surprise endgame tech.
damprock: Extends Rain Dance duration to 8 turns. Staple for Pelipper/Kyogre manual rain.
destinyknot: If holder becomes infatuated, passes it to the foe. Niche; mostly useless in VGC.
dracoplate: Holder's Dragon-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Dragon Fang.
dragonfang: Holder's Dragon-type attacks have 1.2x power. Consistent boost for Dragon moves.
dreadplate: Holder's Dark-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Black Glasses.
earthplate: Holder's Ground-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Soft Sand.
ejectbutton: Consumable. If holder takes a hit, it switches out. Used on weather setters to cycle slots.
ejectpack: Consumable. If holder's stats drop, it switches out. Pairs with Overheat/Draco Meteor.
electricseed: Consumable. Raises Defense by 1 stage on Electric Terrain. Great for Unburden Sneasler.
enigmaberry: Consumable. Restores 1/4 HP if hit by a supereffective move. Niche.
eviolite: If holder is NFE (and can evolve), Def and Sp. Def are 1.5x. Enabler for Porygon2/Clefairy.
expertbelt: Holder's supereffective attacks deal 1.2x damage. Good for coverage attackers.
figyberry: Consumable. Restores 33% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less (confuses if -Atk nature). Standard burst healing.
fistplate: Holder's Fighting-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Black Belt.
flameorb: End of turn: burns holder. Enabler for Guts (Ursaluna) or Fling.
flameplate: Holder's Fire-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Charcoal.
floatstone: Halves holder's weight. Useful against Low Kick/Grass Knot.
focusband: 10% chance to survive a KO with 1 HP. Unreliable; Focus Sash is preferred.
focussash: If at full HP, holder survives a KO hit with 1 HP. Essential for frail leads.
fullincense: Holder moves last in priority bracket. Niche; used for Trick Room 'underspeeding'.
ganlonberry: Consumable. Raises Defense by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Very niche.
grassyseed: Consumable. Raises Defense by 1 stage on Grassy Terrain. Common on Acrobatics Sneasler.
gripclaw: Binding moves last 7 turns. Niche trap strategy item.
griseouscore: Holder must be Giratina-Origin. Boosts Ghost/Dragon moves by 20% and changes form. Required for Giratina-O.
habanberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Dragon-type attack. Helps Dragons survive mirror matches.
hardstone: Holder's Rock-type attacks have 1.2x power. Basic boost for Rock Slide.
hearthflamemask: Holder must be Ogerpon. Becomes Fire-type; attacks have 1.2x power. Prevents item removal.
heatrock: Extends Sunny Day duration to 8 turns. Staple for Torkoal/Groudon.
heavydutyboots: Holder is immune to entry hazards. Good for 6v6 or switching-heavy teams.
iapapaberry: Consumable. Restores 33% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less (confuses if -Def nature). Standard burst healing.
icicleplate: Holder's Ice-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Never-Melt Ice.
icyrock: Extends Snowscape/Hail duration to 8 turns. Essential for Alolan Ninetales.
insectplate: Holder's Bug-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Silver Powder.
ironball: Halves Speed and grounds holder. Used for Trick Room underspeeding.
ironplate: Holder's Steel-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Metal Coat.
jabocaberry: Consumable. If hit by physical move, attacker loses 1/8 HP. Niche chip damage.
kasibberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Ghost-type attack. Critical for Gholdengo.
kebiaberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Poison-type attack. Essential for Fairy-types.
keeberry: Consumable. Raises Defense by 1 stage if hit by a physical move. Niche bulk booster.
kingsrock: Attacks have 10% chance to flinch. Used on Maushold or multi-hit users.
laggingtail: Holder moves last in priority bracket. Used on Prankster supports to disable opponents.
lansatberry: Consumable. Raises crit ratio by 2 stages at 1/4 max HP. Niche.
laxincense: Lowers accuracy of attacks against holder by 5%. Inferior Bright Powder.
leftovers: Restores 1/16 max HP at end of turn. Win-con for bulky setup mons.
leppaberry: Consumable. Restores 10 PP to depleted move. Infinite recovery loops or anti-pressure.
liechiberry: Consumable. Raises Attack by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Niche.
lifeorb: Attacks do 1.3x damage, but holder loses 10% HP. Standard for mixed attackers.
lightball: If Pikachu, Atk and Sp. Atk are 2x. Makes Pikachu hit hard.
lightclay: Reflect/Light Screen last 8 turns. Mandatory for screens setters.
loadeddice: Multi-hit moves hit 4-5 times. Core item for Scale Shot/Icicle Spear users.
lumberry: Consumable. Cures any status. High value on attackers to block Burn/Sleep.
luminousmoss: Consumable. Raises Sp. Def by 1 stage if hit by Water move. Niche.
lustrousglobe: Holder must be Palkia-Origin. Boosts Dragon/Water moves by 20% and changes form. Required for Palkia-O.
magnet: Holder's Electric-type attacks have 1.2x power. Basic boost.
magoberry: Consumable. Restores 33% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less (confuses if -Spe nature). Standard burst healing.
marangaberry: Consumable. Raises Sp. Def by 1 stage if hit by a special move. Niche bulk booster.
meadowplate: Holder's Grass-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Miracle Seed.
mentalherb: Consumable. Cures Taunt/Encore/Disable. Mandatory on Trick Room setters.
metalcoat: Holder's Steel-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Make It Rain.
metronome: Damage increases with consecutive uses of same move. Used on Urshifu/Flutter Mane.
micleberry: Consumable. Next move has 1.2x accuracy at 1/4 max HP. Niche.
mindplate: Holder's Psychic-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Twisted Spoon.
miracleseed: Holder's Grass-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Rillaboom's Grassy Glide.
mirrorherb: Consumable. Copies opponent's stat boosts. Great anti-setup item.
mistyseed: Consumable. Raises Sp. Def by 1 stage on Misty Terrain. Used on bulky supports.
muscleband: Holder's physical attacks have 1.1x power. No recoil; decent filler.
mysticwater: Holder's Water-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Surging Strikes.
nevermeltice: Holder's Ice-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Ice Spinner.
normalgem: Consumable. First Normal-type attack has 1.3x power. Used for Explosion/Extreme Speed.
occaberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Fire-type attack. Staple on Steel/Grass types.
oddincense: Holder's Psychic-type attacks have 1.2x power. Same as Twisted Spoon.
passhoberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Water-type attack. Useful for Fire/Ground types.
payapaberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Psychic-type attack. Useful for Fighting/Poison types.
petayaberry: Consumable. Raises Sp. Atk by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Niche.
pixieplate: Holder's Fairy-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent.
poisonbarb: Holder's Poison-type attacks have 1.2x power. Basic boost.
powerherb: Consumable. Two-turn moves complete in one turn. Enables instant Meteor Beam/Electro Shot.
protectivepads: Holder ignores contact effects. Safe contact moves against Rocky Helmet.
psychicseed: Consumable. Raises Sp. Def by 1 stage on Psychic Terrain. Core item for Unburden Sneasler.
punchingglove: Punching moves have 1.1x power and ignore contact. Excellent on Urshifu.
quickclaw: 20% chance to move first in priority bracket. RNG item.
redcard: Consumable. If holder takes a hit, attacker is forced to switch. Disrupts setup.
rindoberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Grass-type attack. Useful for Water/Ground types.
rockincense: Holder's Rock-type attacks have 1.2x power. Same as Hard Stone.
rockyhelmet: If holder hit by contact, attacker loses 1/6 max HP. Best punish tool against Physical attackers.
roomservice: Consumable. Lowers Speed by 1 stage if Trick Room active. Niche self-slow item.
roseincense: Holder's Grass-type attacks have 1.2x power. Same as Miracle Seed.
roseliberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Fairy-type attack. Vital for Dragons.
rowapberry: Consumable. If hit by special move, attacker loses 1/8 HP. Niche chip.
rustedshield: Holder must be Zamazenta. Becomes Fighting/Steel. Required for Zamazenta-C.
rustedsword: Holder must be Zacian. Becomes Fairy/Steel. Required for Zacian-C.
safetygoggles: Holder immune to powder moves and weather damage. Hard counter to Amoonguss.
salacberry: Consumable. Raises Speed by 1 stage when at 1/4 max HP or less. Endure strategies.
scopelens: Raises critical hit ratio by 1 stage. Used with high-crit moves.
seaincense: Holder's Water-type attacks have 1.2x power. Same as Mystic Water.
sharpbeak: Holder's Flying-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Brave Bird.
shedshell: Holder cannot be trapped. Counter to Shadow Tag.
shellbell: Heals 1/8 of damage dealt. Inferior to Leftovers usually.
shucaberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Ground-type attack. Staple for Fire/Steel types.
silkscarf: Holder's Normal-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Extreme Speed/Blood Moon.
silverpowder: Holder's Bug-type attacks have 1.2x power. Basic boost.
sitrusberry: Consumable. Restores 1/4 max HP when at 1/2 max HP or less. Most consistent burst heal.
skyplate: Holder's Flying-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Sharp Beak.
smoothrock: Extends Sandstorm duration to 8 turns. Staple for Tyranitar.
snowball: Consumable. Raises Attack by 1 stage if hit by Ice move. Niche.
softsand: Holder's Ground-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Earthquake.
souldew: If Lati@s, Dragon/Psychic moves have 1.2x power. Signature boost.
spelltag: Holder's Ghost-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Shadow Ball.
splashplate: Holder's Water-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Mystic Water.
spookyplate: Holder's Ghost-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Spell Tag.
starfberry: Consumable. Sharply raises random stat at 1/4 max HP. Pure RNG.
stickybarb: Damages holder each turn; transfers on contact. Niche/Meme.
stoneplate: Holder's Rock-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Hard Stone.
tangaberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Bug-type attack. Rare.
terrainextender: Extends Terrain duration to 8 turns. Key for Rillaboom/Indeedee.
throatspray: Consumable. Raises Sp. Atk by 1 stage after using sound move. Excellent on Farigiraf/Sylveon.
toxicorb: End of turn: badly poisons holder. Activates Poison Heal/Toxic Boost.
toxicplate: Holder's Poison-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Poison Barb.
twistedspoon: Holder's Psychic-type attacks have 1.2x power. Boosts Expanding Force.
wacanberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Electric-type attack. Used on Water/Flying types.
waveincense: Holder's Water-type attacks have 1.2x power. Same as Mystic Water.
weaknesspolicy: Consumable. If hit supereffectively, Atk/Sp. Atk +2. High risk/reward.
wellspringmask: Holder must be Ogerpon. Becomes Water-type; attacks have 1.2x power. Prevents item removal.
whiteherb: Consumable. Restores lowered stats. Counters Intimidate or move drops.
widelens: Accuracy is 1.1x. Fixes Maushold/Rock Slide consistency.
wikiberry: Consumable. Restores 33% max HP at 1/4 max HP or less (confuses if -SpA nature). Standard burst healing.
wiseglasses: Holder's special attacks have 1.1x power. Inferior to Life Orb.
yacheberry: Consumable. Halves damage from a supereffective Ice-type attack. Essential for Ground/Dragons.
zapplate: Holder's Electric-type attacks have 1.2x power. Plate equivalent of Magnet.
zoomlens: Accuracy is 1.2x if holder moves last. Good for slow attackers with inaccurate moves.
